quoteText:
Where you have provided express and unambiguous consent, we share your Personal Data as described at the time of consent.
This form of consent is also given when you take action on a client campaign or when you sign a petition.
We do not otherwise share any of your Personal Data that identifies you, except as instructed by you.
title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent

tosdr.case: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
